text: Yabedeeyab! It's Francis!
This time I shall introduce curry and ramen that we love eating.
They're like our national foods.
First, I came to eat the famous Yokosuka Navy Curry,
which is a pioneer of local currys.
The thick curry eaten in Japan has the root in the military food
that was served in the Japanese navy.
Yosuka Navy Curry was restored using the recipe from back then.
You can only eat it in Yokosuka.
That is Yokosuka Navy Curry.
I'll enjoy the atmosphere of the Meiji-era as I eat the curry.
Five principals of the Yokosuka Navy Curry
Let's remember them:
After enjoying the Yokosuka Navy Curry,
Let's go buy some souvenirs!
I must get retort curry before going home!
You can readily enjoy your Yokosuka Navy Curry at home.
Yokosuka is a city of the sea and the base.
Good heavens! This is curry flavoured?!
*sniff sniff*
